parameters.name: Api-Version
parameters.description: API version to use

parameters.name: boardId
parameters.description: Format - uuid. Board identifier

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: Format - uuid. Campaign link identifier

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Only get results that include these channel Ids. Prefix with "-" to exclude channel Id instead. It is possible to specify multiple channel Ids

parameters.name: activities
parameters.description: Only get results that include these activities. Prefix with "-" to exclude activity instead. It is possible to specify multiple activities

parameters.name: referrers
parameters.description: Only get results that include these referrers. Prefix with "-" to exclude referrer instead. It is possible to specify multiple referrers

parameters.name: isoCodes
parameters.description: Only get results that include these iso codes. Prefix with "-" to exclude iso code instead. It is possible to specify multiple iso codes

parameters.name: MediaServiceNames
parameters.description: Only get results that include these media services. Prefix with "-" to exclude media service instead. It is possible to specify multiple media services

parameters.name: deviceTypes
parameters.description: Only get results that include these device types. Prefix with "-" to exclude device type instead. It is possible to specify multiple device types

parameters.name: osGroups
parameters.description: Only get results that include these operating systems. Prefix with "-" to exclude operating system instead. It is possible to specify multiple operating systems

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Only get results starting from this date (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Only get results until this date (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results ascending by field. Prefix with "-" to sort descending. It is possible to sort on these fields: ItemsSold, Earnings

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Format - int32. Page number to get. Default is 0 (first page)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. Number of results to get per page. Max 1000
